name: Find The Difference: Detective
description:
Hello, difference detection genius! Enter the magical find the difference world and enjoy the land of fairy tales!
The aim of find the difference game is to find differences between two very similar images. If you like playing free puzzle games,
you are surely going to love this “find the difference free” game 500 levels which we have created especially for you!
Discover “what's the difference” between two pictures and spend hours of fun playing this spot it game!
